text: Vierumäki is a district in the major region of Korso in Vantaa, Finland. On January 1, 2016, there were 1,426 inhabitants in Vierumäki. The district is bordered by the districts of Korso and Vallinoja and the municipality of Tuusula.Väestöraportti 2016 The City of Vantaa (in Finnish). Retrieved on January 21, 2017. Vierumäki is one of the safest neighbourhoods in the capital region. == References == category:Districts of Vantaa
title: Vierumäki (Vantaa)
